#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int n, int m) {
	while(m>0) {
		int temp = m;
		m = n%m;
		n = temp;
	}
	return n;
}
int main() {
	int t, n, m;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
		cin >> n >> m;
		if(m < n)
			n = n+ m - (m=n);
		int gcdv = gcd(m-1, n-1);
		cout << gcdv + 1 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
